titles.title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Management Reorganization Act of 1993
To promote and support management reorganization of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1920)
Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology. (Referral Suspended).
Mr. Clay asked unanimous consent that the bill be rereferred jointly to the Committeess on Science, Space, and Technology and Post Office and Civil Service. Agreed to without objection.
Rereferred jointly to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.
Rereferred jointly to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology. (Referral Suspended)

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology. (Referral Suspended)

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 7/29/1993--Introduced. National Aeronautics and Space Administration Management Reorganization Act of 1993 - Directs the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) to establish a separation pay program to encourage eligible employees to voluntarily retire or resign from NASA.
